thread.title: 'No one believed, because no one listened': Nassar victim blasts MSU, U.S.A Gymnastics

title: 'No one believed, because no one listened': Nassar victim blasts MSU, U.S.A Gymnastics
text:
'No one believed, because no one listened': Nassar victim blasts MSU, U.S.A Gymnastics 2:47am GMT - 01:28 
Rachael Denhollander, the first woman to publicly accuse Larry Nassar in 2016, claimed that Michigan State University and USA Gymnastics knew about allegations of abuse against Larry Nassar years ago and failed to act. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
